data.text:
@JamesEdwardDing @MCCBurnage HI,
Thanks for your post - I have passed the details onto the relevant team

@JamesEdwardDing @MCCBurnage Thanks for letting us know about this James. We'll look into it and make sure the equipment is replaced and bins are emptied as soon as possible. We hope you're able to enjoy a litter pick on your next trip to the park 😌

@ManCityCouncil @MCCBurnage I came across one of these in Whitworth park the other day, unfortunately the litter picker was missing, there were no bags and the bins in the park where it was standing were full and overflowing. It is a nice idea, but doesn't work if the bins are full.
